title: cannot display this video mode
body:
after patch 7.1 i got the resolution problem "cannot display this video mode" and even now in patch 7.3 i still have the same problem i have to play the game in windowed mode or else i get a black screen and the usual message. 
plz help

replies.body:
Your fullscreen resolution inside your settings file that's saved server-side could be completely wacky. I'd recommend performing a reset of this file with the following steps. First thing's first, you'll want to **log into the League Client** then navigate to your config folder, which should be here:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete the following files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, hop into a custom match to confirm the change went through. Try swapping back over the Fullscreen and let me know if this resolved the issue.
no luck i tried it and everything is the same :(

Unfortunate. :(

We can further troubleshoot this with you, but we'll need to escalate this to our tech team. I recommend grabbing some system logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attaching the zipped logs to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you run into any issues.
